REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1228 reute d f BC-CRAY-<CYR>-GETS-3.6-M 06-02 0051

TEXT.TITLE: CRAY <CYR> GETS 3.6 MLN DLR COMPUTER ORDER
TEXT.BODY: Cray Research Inc said Aerospatiale, a French aerospace company, ordered a Cray X-MP/14se computer system valued at about 3.6 mln dlrs. It said the leased system will be installed in the fourth quarter, pending export license approval. Reuter
